content: I expect that at the merge, flashbots network will be proposing full blocks instead of bundles and for builders in the flashbots network to set their own coinbase address (though this is still in progress of being spec’d and I would welcome feedback)

author: thegostep
content: One overarching question I have after reading this conversation:

author: thegostep
content: Does the consensus client need to know if the execution payload is ever revealed?

author: thegostep
content: My intuition says that ideally it’s up to the execution clients to determine if the consensus head contains a valid execution payload, and decide if it should build on top of it or skip it

author: thegostep
content: But it may be a gap in my understanding
